long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a ribbon on top of videos (works with youtube also) that allows users to change the playback speeds from 1x to 2.5x easily. This works for html 5 videos only, flash is not supported.
